naslov: DVOSTAMBENA KUĆA CENTAR BRIBIR, Vinodolska Općina, Bribir (prodaja)
opis: PRODAJA – Kuća s velikom parcelom, Bribir (150 m od centra) Prodaje se samostalna kuća (godina izgradnje 1980.) s dva odvojena stana, ukupne stambene površine 200 m² (svaka jedinica 100 m²), na mirnoj lokaciji samo 150 m od centra Bribira. Idealna za veću obitelj ili turistički najam. Link na video: https://youtu.be/qZ8Mn4jtt4g Parcela 1.700 m² – mogućnost bazena, ljetne kuhinje, vrta, parkirališta Dvije odvojene jedinice – svaka s 3 spavaće sobe, kupaonicom, dodatnim WC-om i terasom Krov: valovitka, prozori: drveni s kapcima, djelomično PVC (dvoslojni) Podne obloge: keramika, parket, podno grijanje Potpuna privatnost, otvoren pogled na staru gradsku jezgru Uređena dokumentacija – građevinska i uporabna dozvola Samo nekoliko minuta vožnje do Crikvenice, Novog Vinodolskog i mora Kuća je funkcionalna i useljiva, potrebna djelomična obnova za postizanje punog potencijala. Izvrsna investicijska prilika na popularnoj turističkoj destinaciji! Kontakt: Nataša Poljanec – licenca br. 3061 24nep d.o.o. Ljubljanska ulica 87, 2000 Maribor Tel.: +386 (0)40 501 553 _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________ SALE – House with Large Plot, Bribir (150 m from the Center) For sale: a detached house (built in 1980) with two separate apartments, total living area of 200 m² (each unit 100 m²), in a quiet location just 150 m from the center of Bribir. Ideal for a large family or tourist rental. Video link: https://youtu.be/qZ8Mn4jtt4g Plot of 1,700 m² – potential for a pool, outdoor kitchen, garden, parking Two separate units – each with 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, an additional toilet, and a terrace Roof: corrugated, windows: wooden with shutters, partially PVC (double-glazed) Flooring: ceramic tiles, parquet, underfloor heating Complete privacy, open view of the old town center Complete documentation – building and occupancy permits Just a few minutes' drive to Crikvenica, Novi Vinodolski, and the sea The house is functional and move-in ready, requiring partial renovation to reach its full potential. An excellent investment opportunity in a popular tourist destination! Contact: Nataša Poljanec – license no. 3061 24nep d.o.o. Ljubljanska ulica 87, 2000 Maribor Tel.: +386 (0)40 501 553
